import React from "react"; import Navbar from "../components/Navbar"; const About = () => { return ( <>
{/* Hero section */}

About Our Expense Tracker

Simplify your finances, track your expenses, and achieve your financial goals with our intuitive expense tracker app.

{/* Content section */}

Track Expenses Effortlessly

Our expense tracker app allows you to effortlessly track your expenses in real-time. Say goodbye to paper receipts and manual spreadsheets. With our user-friendly interface, you can easily categorize expenses, set budgets, and gain insights into your spending habits.

View Transactions Anytime

Utilize the Transactions page to view all your recent and past transactions. Easily categorize transactions, filter by date or category, and stay organized with detailed transaction records.

Manage Your Income Sources

Keep track of your income sources and earnings with our Income page. Input your income sources, set up recurring income, and monitor your earnings over time to stay on top of your finances.

Achieve Financial Freedom

Take control of your finances and work towards financial freedom. Whether you're saving for a vacation, paying off debt, or planning for retirement, our expense tracker app empowers you to make informed financial decisions and achieve your goals.

{/* Footer */}

Expense Tracker: A place for tracking expenses

); }; export default About;
